entities.name: ANTITRUST COMPLIANCE OFFICE
entities.description: The Antitrust Compliance Office is responsible for monitoring the company's compliance with various legal requirements.

entities.name: BAROVIC V. BALLMER ET AL
entities.description: A legal case involving the company, which resulted in a Final Order and Judgment in the United States District Court for the Western District of Washington.

entities.name: UNITED STATES DISTRICT COURT FOR THE WESTERN DISTRICT OF WASHINGTON
entities.description: The court that issued the Final Order and Judgment in the case Barovic v. Ballmer et al.

entities.name: EUROPEAN COMMISSION
entities.description: The European Commission issued the 2004 Decision and the 2009 Undertaking related to the company's compliance.

entities.name: REGULATORY AND PUBLIC POLICY COMMITTEE OF THE BOARD
entities.description: A committee of the company's Board of Directors to which the Antitrust Compliance Officer reported.

entities.name: NASDAQ STOCK MARKET
entities.description: The stock exchange on which the company's common stock is traded under the symbol MSFT.

entities.name: MICROSOFT
entities.description: The company whose activities and legal proceedings are described in the document.

entities.name: BALLMER
entities.description: An individual involved in the legal case Barovic v. Ballmer et al.

entities.name: BOARD OF DIRECTORS
entities.description: The governing body of Microsoft, which declared dividends during the fourth quarter of fiscal year 2021.

relationships.relationship_description: The Antitrust Compliance Office monitors Microsoft's compliance with various legal requirements.
Microsoft was involved in the legal case Barovic v. Ballmer et al.

relationships.source_entity: UNITED STATES DISTRICT COURT FOR THE WESTERN DISTRICT OF WASHINGTON
relationships.relationship_description: The United States District Court for the Western District of Washington issued the Final Order and Judgment in the case Barovic v. Ballmer et al.
The European Commission issued decisions and undertakings related to Microsoft's compliance.

relationships.source_entity: REGULATORY AND PUBLIC POLICY COMMITTEE OF THE BOARD
relationships.relationship_description: The Regulatory and Public Policy Committee of the Board received reports from the Antitrust Compliance Officer regarding Microsoft's compliance.
Microsoft's common stock is traded on the NASDAQ Stock Market under the symbol MSFT.
Ballmer was involved in the legal case Barovic v. Ballmer et al.
Microsoft's Board of Directors declared dividends during the fourth quarter of fiscal year 2021.
